column4: Will: could be a mismatch of sampling rates, like a 44K sampled file played back at 48K.

i have no idea. the rest of the episodes from the same series sound absolutely fine. i've got pretty good hearing and i know radio shows often increase the speed of songs, and this is a radioshow turned into a TV programme (the ricky gervais show), so either it's an conversion error on their end, or deliberately trying to pack in more
that or i'm finally having a tea and jam toast fuelled breakdown
i'd have absolutely no idea how to do that?
